description:
You are a young alchemist on a quest to brew a magical potion. Each day, you add a specific number of ingredients to the cauldron. Write a function to *Recursively* calculate the total number of ingredients used to brew the potion over a given number of day.


Input:
An integer n, representing the number of days you have brewed the potion.
An integer ingredientsPerDay, representing the number of ingredients added to the cauldron each day.

Constraints:
(1 ≤ n ≤ 20)
(1 ≤ ingredientsPerDay ≤ 100)

Output:
An integer representing the total number of ingredients used over n days.

Input:
8 9

Output:
72

Input:
10 6

Output:
60
title: Ingredients of Alchemist
